title: TanStack Start web app
description: Create apps/web as the TanStack Start web application with SSR, file-based routing, Tailwind CSS v4, and ShadCN UI configuration. Includes package.json (@nutricodex/web with all dependencies), tsconfig.json (extends react.json, path aliases), vite.config.ts (TanStack Start plugin, React, Tailwind CSS, tsconfig paths, SSR noExternal), app.config.ts (TanStack Start defineConfig with Node.js server preset), src/styles/globals.css (Tailwind v4 directives with ShadCN theme variables), src/router.tsx (ConvexQueryClient + TanStack Router integration), src/routes/__root.tsx (root layout with HTML document structure), src/routes/index.tsx (placeholder index page), src/lib/utils.ts (cn utility), src/components/ui/ (empty directory for ShadCN components), and components.json (ShadCN UI configuration).
acceptance_criteria: apps/web/package.json has name @nutricodex/web, type module, scripts for dev/build/serve/lint/type-check

Dependencies include @tanstack/react-start, @tanstack/react-router, @tanstack/react-query, @convex-dev/react-query, @tanstack/react-router-with-query, react, react-dom, convex, @nutricodex/backend workspace:*, clsx, tailwind-merge, class-variance-authority
devDependencies include @nutricodex/typescript-config workspace:*, @tailwindcss/vite, tailwindcss, @vitejs/plugin-react, vite, vite-tsconfig-paths, typescript, @types/react, @types/react-dom
tsconfig.json extends @nutricodex/typescript-config/react.json with path aliases @/* and ~/* mapping to ./src/*
vite.config.ts configures TanStack Start plugin, React plugin, Tailwind CSS v4 Vite plugin, and tsconfig paths
src/styles/globals.css imports tailwindcss and defines @theme block with ShadCN color and radius variables
src/router.tsx creates router with ConvexQueryClient, ConvexProvider wrapper, and typed route tree
src/routes/__root.tsx renders full HTML document with HeadContent, Outlet, Scripts, and meta tags
src/routes/index.tsx renders a minimal placeholder with 'NutriCodex' heading using Tailwind classes
src/lib/utils.ts exports cn() function using clsx and tailwind-merge
components.json configures ShadCN UI with new-york style, correct alias paths, and Tailwind v4 CSS path
FR-2.1 through FR-2.6, FR-2.8 are satisfied
